findings.title: Balance Modifier Function
findings.description: No Balance Modifier function found. If there is a function for this, the contract owner can have the authority to modify the balance of tokens at other addresses.

findings.title: Blacklist Function
findings.description: No Blacklist Setting function found. If there is a blacklist, some addresses may not be able to trade normally.

findings.title: Whitelist Function
findings.description: If there is a function for this Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for adresses (for example team wallets can trade without fee). Can cause farming

findings.title: Owner Analysis
findings.description: The current owner address of the contract is 0x28E37C3Dc61D0F6d13BAb930ee69e462aeBB505a which is also the creator address.

findings.title: Retrieve Ownership Function
findings.description: No functions found which can retrieve ownership of the contract. If this function exists, it is possible for the project owner to regain ownership even after relinquishing it. Also known as fake renounce.

findings.title: Self Destruct Function
findings.description: If this function exists and is triggered, the contract will be destroyed, all functions will be unavailable, and all related assets will be erased.
